name: Bellam Nuvvala Laddu
description: Nuvvula Undalu is the authentic sweet made from the sesame seeds or Nuvulu and Jaggery.The Bellam Nuvvula Undalu is a sweetened snack with delectable texture.

name: Bandar Laddu
description: The delicious Bandar Ladoo is also named Tokkudu because of the implemented approach of cooking the dessert.This tasty ladoo will melt into your mouth immediately with a saccharine mellow flavor.

name: Nethi Bobbatlu
description: Nethi Bobbatlu is one of the age-old recipes made of Jaggery and Bengal gram, which imparts a lot of health benefits.The jaggery will aid in boosting the hemoglobin content in blood and reduce the risk of anemia.

name: Paramannam
description: Paramannam is a traditional South Indian rice pudding that is creamy and delicious. This version uses jaggery as sweetener and tastes earthy and amazing.

name: Junnu
description: Junnu, also known as colostrum and kharvas is a milk pudding cooked using the colostrum produced by a cow during an initial couple of days after delivery of the calf.

name: Gulab Jamun
description: Gulab jamun is an Indian dessert of fried dough balls soft, delicious and soaked in a sugary syrup, our mini jamuns are the perfect dessert for the whole family after a hearty meal.

name: Andhra Murukulu
description: This traditional Indian savory snack is specially prepared during festivals or served as a tea-time snack. This savory is originally made out of rice flour base.

name: Butter Murukulu
description: Butter Murukku recipe or Benne Chakli - light, crunchy, delicious, buttery festive snack made with butter, rice flour & other ingredients.

name: Senagalu
description: Senagalu or Chick Peas is very healthy and tasty. Senagalu are an excellent source of Protein, Fibre, Niacin, Iron, magnesium.

name: Pulihora
description: Pulihora is stomach filling, extremely delicious for its tangy, sour and salty taste. It is extremely flavorful that comes from the fresh curry leaves,dry red chilies and green chilies.

name: Masala Cashew
description: Made with BIG flavor, these homemade masala cashews are crunchy, salty, spicy, and majorly addictive. Spiced cashews are the perfect savory.

name: Chekkalu
description: Chekkalu are a traditional fried snack from Andhra pradesh that are crunchy, delicious and addictive. These are made in most Telugu speaking homes.

name: Biyyam Pindi Vadiyalu
description: This rice papad is very popular since it is made of pure rice and sago. The finest chefs carefully cook these Indian specialties to a crisp, golden brown with a tinge of cumin seeds.

name: Challa Mirchi
description: Crunchy and delectable Curd chilies are prepared with curd, green chilies, and a hint of turmeric and salt.They make for a popular dal rice and have often served with sambar or rasam.

name: Minapa Vadiyalu
description: These Black gram fryums are just the kind of snack that will make your meal simpler, yet more flavorful. Urad Dal Badiâ€™s colorful, crunchy and crispy goodness.

name: RiceFlour Vadiyalu
description: Rice flour Vadiyalu is the best combination with Rasam and Sambar rice, traditional way of preparation makes every crunch with natural authenticity.

name: Gottalu
description: Gottalu (Fryums) is ready to fry Indian snack that is made by using all-purpose flour, salt. Fryums are made in different shapes that are in round/flat shape also called Pipe Fryums.

name: Appadalu
description: A papad, also known as a papadam, is an Indian dough of black gram bean flour, either deep fried or cooked with dry heat until crunchy.Other flours made from lentils,rice,tapioca are also used.

name: Idli Karam podi
description: Idli Karam podi is the blend of spices and condiments, mainly Bengal gram, urad dal,cumin, salt, garlic, and red chili to finish it into a delightful spice side dish for breakfast and meals.

name: Nuvvula Karam podi
description: The Nuvvula Karam Powder has conventionally made of nuvvulu (sesame seeds), urad dal, Bengal gram, curry leaves, red chili powder, and other spices.

name: Kakarakaya Karam Podi
description: Our Bitter gourd karam is made with hand-cut and roasted kakarakaya/bitter gourd, along with lentils and aroma spices in 100% organic oil.

name: Kandi Podi
description: Kandi podi is a spice and condiment combination that includes Tur dal, Bengal gram, urad dal, cumin, salt, garlic, and red chili to create a delicious spicy side dish.

name: Avisaginjala Podi
description: Avise podi is made by finely roasting the flaxseeds and other spices to give you the yummy and piquant side dish uses culinary methods followed by our great grandmothers.

name: Karivepaku Karam Podi
description: Curry leaves are the main ingredient in Karivepaku Karam, and it provides surplus nutrition that can benefit in improving the health condition and reduce the risk of diabates.

name: Pandumirchi Pickle
description: The pickle is a tangy spicy concoction of the choicest spices, tamarind, and red chilies. It is rich in vitamin C. It is a favorite in the spice-loving regions of Andhra Pradesh and Telangana.

name: Gongura Pickle
description: A unique, spicy and flavourful gongura pickle that enhances the taste of every meal, giving you an amazing experience. Prepared using the finest ingredients.

name: CurryLeaf Pickle
description: The main ingredients in this pickle are curry leaves and Tamarind.This spicy and refreshing pickle added with flavors of different spices in its preparation will leave us nostalgic.

name: Usirikaya Pickle
description: Amla Achar is one of the age-old pickles passed down from our ancestors. The amla pickle is also called Nellikkai, or usirikaya, or Gooseberry.

name: Garlic Pickle
description: This North Indian Punjabi style Garlic Pickle known as lahsun ka achar is an heirloom family recipe that is spiced, salty, sour & sweet.

name: Drumstick Pickle
description: Drumstick pickle or Murrungaka pickle is a south Indian special pickle variety.This can be a great side dish for south Indian meals and other items like dosas and chappatis.

name: Gongura Chicken Pickle
description: This yummylishious pickle made at Indian Snacks has its own flavor of aromatic masala magic, once tasted can't you get enough to satisfy the taste buds and will finish it off.

name: Mutton Pickle
description: Mutton (goat or lamb) pieces are marinated with spices and the mixture of fresh groundnut oil, ginger garlic paste and homemade various spice mix powder.

name: Gongura Prawns Pickle
description: Gongura Prawn Pickle are made by Gongura leaves and Prawns. Gongura leaves being the alluring perennial herb have a lot of medicinal properties.

name: Fish Pickle
description: Fish pickle is the preserved food item through either anaerobic fermentation in brine or. The pH of fish pickle should be 4.6 or lower to reduce the microbial activity.

name: Mutton Keema Pickle
description: Keema Mutton pickle is the best cookery made of mutton Keema and achar masala prepared with zesty spices and condiments to impart the savory and zippy flavor.

name: Koramenu Pickle
description: Koramenu fish pickle is completely hand-made using ambrosial spices that are grind by hand. Only prime ingredients and the purest vegetable oil is used and cooked.
